name: Brick Breaker (itch) (FishMilkGames)
description: Bounce a ball off a paddle into bricks. there are 12 brick filled levels with more to come. there are interesting different  bricks to be found throughout the game.  After you break a brick it has a chance to drop a power up (only some are good). to grab them have your paddle touch them.  Move the paddle with left and right arrow keys and launch the ball at the beginning of every level or after you lost a life with space. Enjoy.
